mapper.select: select STORE_NO , STORE_NAME , STORE_CATEGORY , STORE_DETAIL , STORE_SCORE , LIKE_COUNT from STORE where STORE_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{searchInput},'%') order by LIKE_COUNT DESC;

select STORE_NO , OWN_NO , STORE_NAME , STORE_TEL , replace(STORE_LOCATION, ' ', '+') STORE_LOCATION , STORE_CATEGORY , STORE_DETAIL , STORE_INFO , STORE_PLUS , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(STORE_ST, '%H%i'), '%H:%i') STORE_ST , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(STORE_ET, '%H%i'), '%H:%i') STORE_ET , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(STORE_BT, '%H%i'), '%H:%i') STORE_BT , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(STORE_LO, '%H%i'), '%H:%i') STORE_LO , STORE_RST , STORE_RET , SOTRE_CLOSE , STORE_SCORE , (select count(LIKE_NO) LIKE_COUNT from LIKE_LIST where STORE_NO = #{STORE_NO}) LIKE_COUNT from STORE where STORE_NO = #{STORE_NO};
select MENU_NO , STORE_NO , MENU_NAME , FORMAT(MENU_PRICE, 0) MENU_PRICE , MENU_HIDE , MENU_INFO from MENU where STORE_NO = #{STORE_NO};

select SEAT_NO , STORE_NO , SEAT_NAME , SEAT_USETIME , SEAT_MIN , SEAT_MAX , SEAT_CONTENT , SEAT_OC
from SEAT where STORE_NO = #{STORE_NO};
select SEAT_NO , STORE_NO , SEAT_NAME , SEAT_USETIME , SEAT_MIN , SEAT_MAX , SEAT_CONTENT , SEAT_OC from SEAT where STORE_NO = #{STORE_NO} and SEAT_NO = #{TABLE_NO};
